run: bash -c '(./Falcon.out 2 files/IP_localhost files/keyC files/keyAC files/keyBC >>P2.txt &) && (./Falcon.out 1 files/IP_localhost files/keyB files/keyBC files/keyAB >>P1.txt &) && (./Falcon.out 0 files/IP_localhost files/keyA files/keyAB files/keyAC >>P0.txt); wait'
command_template: bash -c '(./Falcon.out 2 files/IP_${RUN_TYPE} files/keyC files/keyAC files/keyBC ${NETWORK} ${DATASET} ${SECURITY} >>P2.txt &) && (./Falcon.out 1 files/IP_${RUN_TYPE} files/keyB files/keyBC files/keyAB ${NETWORK} ${DATASET} ${SECURITY} >>P1.txt &) && (./Falcon.out 0 files/IP_${RUN_TYPE} files/keyA files/keyAB files/keyAC ${NETWORK} ${DATASET} ${SECURITY} >>P0.txt); wait'
